summary: The document is a restricted identification form within the JFK ASSASSINATION SYSTEM, detailing an investigation into Robert Scheer, a pre-inductee with employment history at Laufer's River View Lodge. It includes personal details, employment records, and notes from a special agent, with noted discrepancies in employment records. The document's classification was later changed to UNCLASSIFIED and marked 'FOR OFFICIAL USE ONLY'.
key_findings: Document is part of the JFK ASSASSINATION SYSTEM and is marked as restricted.
Focuses on Robert Scheer, including his personal details and employment history.
Contains discrepancies in employment records noted by the investigating agent.
Document was regraded to UNCLASSIFIED and marked 'FOR OFFICIAL USE ONLY'.
